blogPost.excerpt: Learn everything about the undocumented secrets in the popular Laravel framework, that makes you a better and more efficient developer.
blogPost.body: Learn everything about the undocumented secrets in the popular Laravel framework, that makes you a better and more efficient developer.
blogPost.title: Laravel Secrets - Learn everything about the undocumented secrets in Laravel
blogPost.author: Tom Witkowski

localize.description: 学习关于流行的Laravel框架中的所有未被记录的秘密,让你成为一个更好更有效的开发者.
localize.tagline: 了解Laravel中的一切无证秘密。

localize.description: 學習關於流行的Laravel框架中的所有未被記錄的祕密,讓你成爲一個更好更有效的開發者.
localize.tagline: 瞭解Laravel中的一切無證祕密。

previous.excerpt: Create a professional online newsroom. In addition to all the features from Ghost, it has some essential features that turn it into a professional online newsroom such as media kits, press clippings, built-in multi-language capabilities and newsletter options.
previous.title: Pressbase - Create professional online newsroom for free

localize.description: 创建一个专业的在线新闻编辑室。除了Ghost的所有功能外，它还有一些必不可少的功能，使其成为一个专业的在线新闻编辑室，如媒体包、新闻剪报、内置多语言功能和通讯选项。
localize.tagline: 免费创建专业的在线新闻编辑室

localize.description: 創建一個專業的在線新聞編輯室。除了Ghost的所有功能外，它還有一些必不可少的功能，使其成爲一個專業的在線新聞編輯室，如媒體包、新聞剪報、內置多語言功能和通訊選項。
localize.tagline: 免費創建專業的在線新聞編輯室

next.excerpt: Veganzone is a new mobile application where people who follow vegan & vegetarian lifestyle can share their common values, meet each other, socialize over the events they create and purchase vegan products.
next.title: Veganzone - By vegans for vegans and vegetarians

localize.description: Veganzone是一个新的移动应用，在这里，遵循素食和素食生活方式的人们可以分享他们的共同价值观，相互认识，通过他们创造的活动进行社交，并购买素食产品。
localize.tagline: 由素食者为素食者和素食者提供服务

localize.description: Veganzone是一個新的移動應用，在這裏，遵循素食和素食生活方式的人們可以分享他們的共同價值觀，相互認識，通過他們創造的活動進行社交，併購買素食產品。
localize.tagline: 由素食者爲素食者和素食者提供服務
